history.proof: unfold Included. unfold T'. apply Union_introl.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: System

Goal:
Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T'

Premises:
NN = Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9 : Ensemble (fol.Formula LNN)
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
System = fol.System LNT : Type
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
T' = Union (fol.Formula LNN) NN (fun x : fol.Formula LNN => mem (fol.Formula LNT) T (LNN2LNT_formula x)) : fol.System LNN
LNN.sysExtend : forall (T U : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> LNN.SysPrf T f -> LNN.SysPrf U f
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNT) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
folLogic.sysExtend : forall (L : Language) (T U : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L), Included (fol.Formula L) T U -> folProof.SysPrf L T f -> folProof.SysPrf L U f
LNN.Axm : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> LNN.SysPrf T f
LNN.sysWeaken : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula), LNN.SysPrf T f -> LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
LNN.impI : forall (T : LNN.System) (f g : LNN.Formula), LNN.SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f -> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.impH g f)
translatePrf : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))) -> forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (axm : fol.Formulas LNN), Prf LNN axm f ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarListFormula LNN axm))
translateProof : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), ClosedSystem LNT V -> (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)
codeSysPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> forall codeArityRIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityR, (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A f p)))
codeSysPfCorrect : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> forall codeArityRIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityR, (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> forall T : LNN.System, Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f)))
codeSysPrfNCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> forall codeArityRIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityR, (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A (fol.notH L f) p)))
codeSysPrfCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> forall p : Prf L A f, LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A f p))))
codeSysPrfNCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> forall p : Prf L A (fol.notH L f), LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A (fol.notH L f) p))))
closedNN : forall v : nat, ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v NN
codeSysPrfCorrect3 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm n)))
boundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : LNN.Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> LNN.SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN a x (LNN.natToTerm n))) -> LNN.SysPrf NN (LNN.impH (LNN.LT (LNN.var x) (LNN.natToTerm m)) a)
nn1 : forall a : LNN.Term, LNN.SysPrf NN (LNN.notH (LNN.equal (LNN.Succ a) LNN.Zero))
natLT : forall a b : nat, a < b -> LNN.SysPrf NN (LNN.LT (LNN.natToTerm a) (LNN.natToTerm b))
nn2 : forall a b : LNN.Term, LNN.SysPrf NN (LNN.impH (LNN.equal (LNN.Succ a) (LNN.Succ b)) (LNN.equal a b))
natNE : forall a b : nat, a <> b -> LNN.SysPrf NN (LNN.notH (LNN.equal (LNN.natToTerm a) (LNN.natToTerm b)))
LNN.Zero = apply LNN Languages.Zero (Tnil LNN) : LNN.Term
primRecRepresentable : forall (n : nat) (f : extEqualNat.naryFunc n) (p : primRec.isPR n f), Representable NN n f (primRecFormula n (proj1_sig p))
codeSysPrfNCorrect3 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (LNN.notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm n)))
fol.Formulas = fun L : Language => list (fol.Formula L) : Language -> Set
fol.System = fun L : Language => Ensemble (fol.Formula L) : Language -> Type
notInFreeVarSys : forall (L : Language) (x : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys L x (Empty_set (fol.Formula L))
LNT2LNN_formula = fix LNT2LNN_formula (f : Formula) : fol.Formula LNN := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => fol.equal LNN (LNT2LNN_term t1) (LNT2LNN_term t2) | @atomic _ r _ => match r return (fol.Formula LNN) with end | @fol.impH _ A B => fol.impH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) (LNT2LNN_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => fol.notH LNN (LNT2LNN_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A => fol.forallH LNN v (LNT2LNN_formula A) end : Formula -> fol.Formula LNN
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula2 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f))
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
LNN2LNT_subTerm : forall (t : fol.Term LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), LNN2LNT_term (substituteTerm LNN t v s) = substituteTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) v (LNN2LNT_term s)
LNN2LNT_subFormula : forall (T : System) (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term LNN), SysPrf T (iffH (LNN2LNT_formula (substituteFormula LNN f v s)) (substituteFormula LNT (LNN2LNT_formula f) v (LNN2LNT_term s)))
translateLT1 : forall (a a0 : fol.Term LNN) (b0 : fol.Terms LNN 0), translateLT (Tcons LNN 1 a (Tcons LNN 0 a0 b0)) = subAll.subAllFormula LNT LTFormula (fun H : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => fol.Term LNT) (LNN2LNT_term a) (fun (H0 : nat) (_ : fol.Term LNT) => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => fol.Term LNT) (LNN2LNT_term a0) (fun (H1 : nat) (_ : fol.Term LNT) => var H1) H0) H)
LNN2LNT_term = fix LNN2LNT_term (t : fol.Term LNN) : Term := match t with | @fol.var _ v => var v | @apply _ f ts => apply LNT f (LNN2LNT_terms (arity LNN (inr f)) ts) end with LNN2LNT_terms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms LNN n) {struct ts} : Terms n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return (Terms n0) with | @Tnil _ => Tnil LNT | @Tcons _ m s ss => Tcons LNT m (LNN2LNT_term s) (LNN2LNT_terms m ss) end for LNN2LNT_term : fol.Term LNN -> Term
checkPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> forall (l : list (fol.Formula L)) (f : fol.Formula L) (p : Prf L l f), checkPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f) (codePrf L codeF codeR l f p) = S (cPair.codeList (map (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR) l))
LNN2LNT_formula = fix LNN2LNT_formula (f : fol.Formula LNN) : Formula := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => equal (LNN2LNT_term t1) (LNN2LNT_term t2) | @atomic _ r ts => match r as l return (fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl l)) -> Formula) with | LT => fun t0 : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => translateLT t0 end ts | @fol.impH _ A B => impH (LNN2LNT_formula A) (LNN2LNT_formula B) | @fol.notH _ A => notH (LNN2LNT_formula A) | @fol.forallH _ v A => forallH v (LNN2LNT_formula A) end : fol.Formula LNN -> Formula
translateLT = fun ts : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => let s := consTerms LNN 1 ts in sig_rec (fun _ : {t : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1 | Tcons LNN 1 (fst t) (snd t) = ts} => Formula) (fun (x : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1) (p : Tcons LNN 1 (fst x) (snd x) = ts) => prod_rec (fun x0 : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 1 => Tcons LNN 1 (fst x0) (snd x0) = ts -> Formula) (fun (a : fol.Term LNN) (b : fol.Terms LNN 1) (_ : Tcons LNN 1 (fst (a, b)) (snd (a, b)) = ts) => let s0 := consTerms LNN 0 b in sig_rec (fun _ : {t : fol.Term LNN * fol.Terms LNN 0 | T...
checkPrfCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n) -> (forall r : Relations L, codeArityR (codeR r) = S (arity L (inl r))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityR n <> 0 -> exists r : Relations L, codeR r = n) -> (forall f g : Functions L, codeF f = codeF g -> f = g) ->...-> exists f : fol.Formula L, code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f = n /\ (exists (l : list (fol.Formula L)) (p : Prf L l f), codePrf L codeF codeR l f p = m)

``` 
intros.
unfold Included.
unfold T'.
apply Union_introl.
apply H.
